Unitron/Serpentor:



Unitron looked around the inside of the volcano.  His estimates had been off, 
he didn't have enough explosives to blow apart the mountain, much less 
collapse it.  He'd have to find a group to use for his own needs...but which 
one?

The Maximals was out of the question.  He wanted nothing to do with them, 
other than opening fire on them.  The Predacons?  No...too disorganized.  The 
Alliance?  That was a good choice...small...yet powerful group.  He should be 
able to dupe them quite nicely...

Unitron transformed into his space fighter mode, launching out of the 
volcano, getting a course set for the Alliance base, his afterburners blasted 
to their full speed, launching him towards the Alliance base.

======

Serpentor was closing in on the Alliance base.  He truly didn't think Hell 
Beast would take him back, Megatron was a complete idiot, and the Maximals 
just plain sucked.  On the other hand, the Alliance HAD killed him until Koga 
Shuko had cloned him.

He stopped.  He was just a clone!  He wasn't the real thing.  Serpentor was 
dead.  He was just a copy.  A very handsome copy, but still just a copy.  But 
then again, he was just as good as the original Serpentor, but he wasn't THE 
Serpentor, or was he?  He shook his head.

"Slag that Unitron!" he yelld.  The snake had planned on staying there for a 
long time, until Unitron started killing everybody inside Shuko's base, then 
blew the slagging base apart!

The cobra-bot sighed, continuing to walk for the Alliance base.
